qas.question: What road does First use stops around to leave a terminal available for other buses?
Which bus service passes West Quay going in both directions?
What operator drops off and picks up passengers at West Quay?
When did the tram system stop operating in Southampton?
Where do buses that loop around West Quay stop?

context: There are two main termini for bus services. As the biggest operator, First uses stops around <a0_0>Pound Tree Road<a0_0/>. This leaves the other terminal of West Quay available for other operators. <a1_0>Uni-link<a1_0/> passes West Quay in both directions, and <a2_0>Wilts & Dorset<a2_0/> drop passengers off and pick them up there, terminating at a series of bus stands along the road. Certain Bluestar services also do this, while others stop at Bargate and some loop round West Quay, stopping at <a4_0>Hanover Buildings<a4_0/>. There was a tram system from 1879 to <a3_0>1949<a3_0/>.
